Description

thatcozydev is a solo game developer who focuses on developing wholesome and meticulously detailed games targeted to all gamers.

History

thatcozydev is a professional software engineer with over 5 years of experience and began transitioning to solo game development in late 2020. After a few unreleased prototypes, he has officially announced his first commercial release: ToyBox Security on DATE.
